summary:
I am a General Partner at B Venture Capital, a seed and early stage venture capital fund investing in tech startups in the Latam region. With over 10 years of experience in strategic planning, marketing, and project management, I have a passion for supporting entrepreneurs and building a stronger startup ecosystem in Latam.

In addition to my investing role, I also serve as a mentor for the Startup Acceleration Program, where I share my insights and advice on digital strategy, growth marketing, and fundraising. Previously, I co-founded CitySpot, a digital content agency in São Paulo, focused on helping small businesses in developing digital strategy. I hold an MBA from IE Business School, a graduate degree in Business in Digital Media, and a BA in Economics. I am fluent in Spanish, English, and Portuguese.
